data.text: What have the US, India, and the UK spent so far to help people and the economy during #COVID19? Read our new #IMFBlog for the latest data from over 15 countries. #ChartOfTheWeek https://t.co/JU9qfpzsNN https://t.co/1QXkah7ivV

IMF’s #WEO research shows that more automatic fiscal stimulus measures triggered by deteriorating macroeconomic indicators can be an effective and timely way to counter negative shocks. #IMFBlog #COVID19 https://t.co/3C4UuAwMnd https://t.co/q6pjF5n5kc

New #WEO study finds that more automatic fiscal responses—such as targeted cash transfers to the poor that kick in when the unemployment rate rises above a certain level—can be highly effective in countering a downturn. #IMFBlog #COVID19 https://t.co/zjH2fQZItE https://t.co/GO05BaqNDl
